data.title: College of DuPage Scholarships
data.text:
Welcome to the College of DuPage Scholarship Portal!

Our Fall 2024 scholarships have been closed. Our next scholarship cycle is for Spring 2025 and will open on September 1 and close November 1. Currently if there are any scholarships, these may be for specific degree programs through various types of institutional funds, you can apply for now. Please be sure to read through the descriptions to ensure you meet the qualifications.

Below you will find a listing of scholarships available to COD students with brief information about the scholarship criteria. In order to apply, you must be a registered, current or incoming COD student, with a user name and password from MyAccess.
